itemincludesprecisiondesignsdsdhcmicrosd: Precision Design USB 2.0 SD / microSD Memory Card Reader Easily transfer files from your SD or microSD memory card. The Precision Design USB 2.0 SD / microSD Card Reader transfers photos and videos from your SD, SDHC, microSD or microSDHC memory card to your computer quickly and easily, without the hassle of connecting your camera to the computer. It provides fast transfer speeds, universal USB 2.0 connectivity, and easy plug-and-play installation. It is compatible with both Windows and Mac , and requires no external power. Key Features: Compatible with SD, SDHC, microSD & microSDHC Easy plug-and-play installation Reads and writes data to and from memory cards Conserves camera battery life Rapid data transfer High speed USB

itemincludesprecisiondesignuniversallcds: Precision Design Universal LCD Screen Protectors Keep your LCD screen clean and protected from scratches. This package contains 3 Universal LCD Screen Protectors that can be easily cut to size, attached and removed. Each piece protects your LCD screen from scratches and wear, and reduces glare for enhanced viewing. A squeegee card is also included to make application even easier, and to reduce air bubbles. These screen protectors can be used on a variety of electronic devices including digital cameras, camcorders, cell phones, handheld video games, and more. Key Features: Prevents scratches and wear Reduces glare Helps to maintain LCD and product warranty Can be trimmed to fit any size LCD screen (up to 5 inches diagonally)

A one-year subscription is included as part of your purchase... that's Outdoor Photographer 11 issues packed with valuable tips, tricks and news about nature photography, conveniently delivered to your door! A prepaid Subscription Voucher Card will be included with your order, which will activate your subscription when mailed to Outdoor Photography. The first of your eleven issues will then be sent to your address (USA and Canadian addresses only) in about 10 weeks. One subscription per household. Outdoor Photography's technique articles are geared to helping you capture the best wildlife, travel and outdoor sports photography. Review photography tips and keep up with digital photography as applied to nature photography, and stay current with the latest in photography equipment. You can also explore readers' favorite places that offer the best in photography locations.

itemincludesprecisiondesign6piececameral: Precision Design 6-Piece Lens & Digital SLR Cleaning Kit Essential items for the proper maintenance of your equipment. It's obvious that the cleaner the lens and camera sensor, the sharper your pictures will be. Dirt, dust, and fingerprints will degrade the image quality of even the finest optics. However, it's equally important to avoid using incorrect cleaning materials which can permanently damage your photo equipment. This 6-piece cleaning kit contains everything you'll ever need to properly clean your lenses and digital SLR camera , including an air blower, soft brush, cleaning solution, lens tissues, cotton swabs, and a microfiber cloth. Also includes a soft carrying pouch.
